definition: Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
to conceal/to hide away/to harbor/to store/to collect

sentences.english: The Sino-Tibetan family consists of about 300 East Asian languages.
sentences.chinese: 漢藏語系包括300多種東亞語言。

sentences.english: Tone is a common phonological feature of Sino-Tibetan languages.
sentences.chinese: 聲調是漢藏語系語言普遍具有的語音特徵。

sentences.english: Chinese belongs to Sino-Tibetan language analysis language, with tones.
sentences.chinese: 漢語屬於漢藏語系分析語，有聲調。
